about_the_game:
Game Description


Embark on a heartfelt adventure in "Mya and their Cat", a charming retro-style exploration game. When Mya's beloved cat goes missing, they find themselves unexpectedly drawn into a hidden world teeming with mystery and danger. As Mya, you must navigate treacherous dungeons, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the secrets of the feline realm to rescue your furry friend.

Overview


Mya is a young adult whose life takes a sudden twist when their cat disappears without a trace. Guided by determination and love, Mya explores a vibrant and whimsical world filled with unique characters, hidden treasures, and challenging foes. Each step brings Mya closer to unraveling the mystery behind their cat's disappearance and understanding the true nature of the secret world of cats.

Key Features


  • Engaging Storyline: Experience a touching narrative that explores themes of friendship, identity, and adventure.
  • Retro Aesthetic: Delight in the nostalgic graphics, lovingly crafted to bring a sense of classic gaming charm.
  • Exploration and Puzzle-Solving: Navigate through intricate dungeons, solve clever puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets.
  • Unique Characters: Meet a cast of memorable characters, each with their own stories and personalities.
  • Dynamic Gameplay: Engage in light combat and use various items and abilities to overcome obstacles and enemies.
  • Immersive World: Discover beautifully designed environments, from quaint villages to mysterious dungeons, each with its own atmosphere and challenges.
Join Mya on their quest to find their missing cat and explore a world where every corner holds a new adventure. Will you be able to uncover the truth and reunite Mya with their furry companion?

Wishlist Now!


Add "Mya and their Cat" to your wishlist and stay tuned for updates and release information. Your adventure awaits!

name: Mya and their Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 or larger screen
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: A retro-style adventure game where you explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets to find Mya's missing cat.
